02 June 2013

Adding Realtime Functionality to Existing PHP Apps

Back in April, I gave a talk at the first PHP Dublin meetup (write up) at Engine Yard's Dublin office. The talk was on adding realtime functionality to existing PHP apps—a process I went through in building ThetaBoard.

A month and a half later, I've finally gotten around to putting up my slides and example code from the talk. Hope someone finds it useful.
